sentence.Network_en: They are the most precious cultural legacy our forefathers left.

sentence.Network_en: All of us bristled at the lawyer's speech insulting our forefathers.
sentence.Network_cn: 听到那个律师在讲演中污蔑我们的祖先,大家都气得怒发冲冠.

sentence.Network_en: He went to visit the graves of his forefathers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他去拜谒他祖先的墓地.

entry.def: Your forefathers are your ancestors, especially your male ancestors.

example.ex: They were determined to go back to the land of their forefathers.
example.tran: 他们决意回到祖先的土地上。
